title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of My Size Inc

content.text: My Size Inc has not undergone any stock splits.
My Size Inc has had a few notable corporate actions:
My Size Inc went public through its Initial Public Offering, offering its shares to the public for the first time.
My Size Inc implemented a 1-for-10 reverse stock split, reducing the number of outstanding shares and increasing the share price.
My Size Inc acquired BoxSizeID, a measurement technology company, expanding its product offerings and capabilities.
My Size Inc formed a partnership with Tukatech, a leading fashion technology solutions provider, to integrate their measurement technology into Tukatech's platform.
My Size Inc launched the MySizeID mobile app, providing consumers with a convenient way to measure themselves for accurate clothing size recommendations.

news.headline: My Size Announces Reverse Stock Split
news.summary: MySize, Inc. (NASDAQ: MYSZ) ("MySize" or the "Company"), an omnichannel e-commerce platform and provider of AI-driven measurement solutions to drive revenue growth and reduce costs for its business clients, announced that its Board of Directors has approved a one-for-eight reverse stock split of its common stock that is scheduled to become effective after trading closes on April 19, 2024.
